argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat2pmatbas.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | mat2pmatbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat2pmatbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat2pmatbas.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mat2pmatbas.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 6 |  | mat2pmatbas0.h | |- H = ( Base ` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 7, 7 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ m e. B ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_mpt2exga | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( x e. N , y e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` P ) ` ( x m y ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ m e. B ) -> ( x e. N , y e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` P ) ` ( x m y ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( algSc ` P ) = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 12 | #P_mat2pmatfval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T = ( m e. B |-> ( x e. N , y e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` P ) ` ( x m y ) ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_mat2pmatbas0 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ m e. B ) -> ( T ` m ) e. H ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ m e. B ) -> ( T ` m ) e. H ) |
| 16 | 11, 13, 15 | #P_fmpt2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B --> H ) |
